function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited research on the association between urban greenery and health benefits","Impact":"Lack of evidence for health benefits in urban areas, potential missed opportunities for improving public health","Mitigation":"Conducting more studies on the association between urban greenery and health, encouraging funding for urban greenery research","Technologies":"Data collection and analysis tools for urban greenery research","People":"Local populations in urban and deprived areas","Owner":"Research institutions, government health departments"},{"Description":"Lack of replication of health benefits in an urban environment","Impact":"Inability to leverage potential health benefits of urban greenery, missed opportunities for public health improvement","Mitigation":"Conducting studies to replicate health benefits of forest bathing in urban areas, implementing urban greenery initiatives","Technologies":"Health monitoring and assessment tools, urban planning and design technologies","People":"Local populations in urban areas","Owner":"Urban planning departments, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Limited guidance for national guidelines on urban greenery for health benefits","Impact":"Potential lack of standardized recommendations for urban greenery, missed opportunities for improving public health in urban areas","Mitigation":"Conducting research to inform national guidelines, collaborating with public health institutions for policy development","Technologies":"Policy analysis tools, data visualization platforms for guideline development","People":"Policy makers, public health officials","Owner":"Research institutions, public health organizations"}]}
